short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the Azure DevOps favicon with page-specific icons

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Azure DevOps uses the same favicon for every page. This extension replaces the icon so different page types have distinctive icons, making it easier to work with multiple Azure DevOps tabs.
